name: bumpy cups
description:
handmade, wheel thrown cups with textured clay bumps. brushed on brightly coloured underglaze on the inside. clear glaze on top and on the outside. 

approximate dimensions: 
diameter 8cm
height 9cm

all of our stoneware products are microwave and dishwasher safe.

please contact us for more details on colours available

as we do not carry large quantities of stock, please assume that all purchases are back orders. 
items will take approximately 3-4 weeks for us to make. 
and yes! we take special requests for colours and customised pieces.
